page.title: 14OUR PARISH MINISTER
page.content: Mr Jenkins, our Parish Minister conducts two services on a Sunday,one at eleven o'clock,and the other at six thirty p.m.He also holds another one on Tuesday evenings.He has to choose the hymns as well as make up a sermon for each service.He holds approximately two baptisms,two funerals and a wedding in a week.He attends three to four meetings and he arranges (with the help of the congregational board) church fetes and other events for the community.Mr Jenkins has to write a letter every month in the church magazine which is called The North Wind.He also visits patients in Milesmark Hospital and old people in the John Douglas Home.
